Unfold

Your Mental Health, Unfolded.

Designed for your mind-body wellness, Unfold helps you connect your thoughts, feelings, and physical health into one seamless journaling experience.

Coming soon...

What Is Unfold?

Unfold is an AI-enhanced journaling app designed to help you reflect, grow, and connect the dots between your emotional and physical wellness. By integrating with popular health wearables like Apple Health, Fitbit, and Oura Ring, Unfold brings your thoughts and body data together in one place.

Transform the Way You Journal

Advanced AI

Unlock deeper interaction and reflections with the most sophisticated AI models around.

Goal Tracking

Identify and track your self-improvement goals with ease and efficiency.

Private & Safe

Your data is encrypted to protect your privacy.

Unfold Listen

Ask Unfold anything about yourself and Unfold will answer based on your entries.

Mind-Body Sync

Keep track of your health activity data seamlessly by syncing your wearables.

Long-Term Memory

Unfold recalls relevant memories as you write, helping you spot patterns and grow.

Weekly Report

Weekly summary and analysis of your journal entries to gain valuable insights.

Real-Human Therapy

Have access to certified professional counselors/therapists for group and personal sessions.

Designed for Every Wellness Journey

Whether you're a mindfulness enthusiast, a busy professional, or someone seeking balance, Unfold adapts to your needs:

  • Reflect on your emotions and goals.
  • Understand your stress levels and energy.
  • Build better habits with personalized insights.
"The concept of syncing mind and body is revolutionary. Unfold is set to redefine how we approach mental wellness."
— Dr. Alex Carter, Mental Health Specialist

Seamlessly Sync with Your Favorite Wearables.

Unfold works with leading devices to give you a full picture of your health.
